00027 #ifndef L4_SYS_KIP_H__
00028 #define L4_SYS_KIP_H__
00029 
00030 /* C++ version of memory descriptors */
00031 
00041 namespace L4
00042 {
00043   namespace Kip
00044   {
00051     class Mem_desc
00052     {
00053     public:
00057       enum Mem_type
00058       {
00059   Undefined    = 0x0,  //< Undefined memory
00060   Conventional = 0x1,  //< Conventional memory
00061   Reserved     = 0x2,  //< Reserved region, do not use this memory
00062   Dedicated    = 0x3,  //< Dedicated
00063   Shared       = 0x4,  //< Shared
00064 
00065   Bootloader   = 0xe,  //< Memory belongs to the boot loader
00066   Arch         = 0xf   //< Architecture specific memory
00067       };
00068     private:
00069       unsigned long _l, _h;
00070 
00071       static unsigned long &memory_info(void *kip) throw()
00072       { return *((unsigned long *)kip + 21); }
00073 
00074       static unsigned long memory_info(void const *kip) throw()
00075       { return *((unsigned long const *)kip + 21); }
00076 
00077     public:
00083       static Mem_desc *first(void *kip) throw()
00084       {
00085   return (Mem_desc*)((char *)kip
00086       + (memory_info(kip) >> ((sizeof(unsigned long)/2)*8)));
00087       }
00088 
00089       static Mem_desc const *first(void const *kip) throw()
00090       {
00091   return (Mem_desc const*)((char const *)kip
00092       + (memory_info(kip) >> ((sizeof(unsigned long)/2)*8)));
00093       }
00094 
00100       static unsigned long count(void const *kip) throw()
00101       {
00102   return memory_info(kip) & ((1UL << ((sizeof(unsigned long)/2)*8)) - 1);
00103       }
00104 
00110       static void count(void *kip, unsigned count) throw()
00111       {
00112   unsigned long &mi = memory_info(kip);
00113   mi = (mi & ~((1UL << ((sizeof(unsigned long)/2)*8)) - 1)) | count;
00114       }
00115 
00125       Mem_desc(unsigned long start, unsigned long end,
00126                Mem_type t, unsigned char st = 0, bool virt = false) throw()
00127       : _l((start & ~0x3ffUL) | (t & 0x0f) | ((st << 4) & 0x0f0)
00128            | (virt?0x0200:0x0)), _h(end | 0x3ffUL)
00129       {}
00130 
00135       unsigned long start() const throw() { return _l & ~0x3ffUL; }
00136 
00141       unsigned long end() const throw() { return _h | 0x3ffUL; }
00142 
00147       unsigned long size() const throw() { return end() + 1 - start(); }
00148 
00153       Mem_type type() const throw() { return (Mem_type)(_l & 0x0f); }
00154 
00159       unsigned char sub_type() const throw() { return (_l >> 4) & 0x0f; }
00160 
00166       unsigned is_virtual() const throw() { return _l & 0x200; }
00167 
00176       void set(unsigned long start, unsigned long end,
00177                Mem_type t, unsigned char st = 0, bool virt = false) throw()
00178       {
00179   _l = (start & ~0x3ffUL) | (t & 0x0f) | ((st << 4) & 0x0f0)
00180              | (virt?0x0200:0x0);
00181 
00182   _h = end | 0x3ffUL;
00183       }
00184 
00185     };
00186   };
00187 };
00188 
00189 #endif
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
